slide.title: Fixed Field Length
slide.blurb: Fixed field length formats reserve the maximum lenght of a field for each data row. As the field length is known no field or line terminators are needed, but:

list.li: the field length information itself is not included
space is wasted for textual fields
use of long VARCHAR or BLOB fields is unrealistic

slide.blurb: This format is hardly ever used these days.
